[b][color=white]My Bio Box[/color][/b]
Now, show off your Profile/Skills in your Bio. Add a short description in your profile up to 2048 characters. Start writing! [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997509]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Github Social Login[/color][/b]
Now, you can log in into HF with your Github account. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997762]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Lounge Head Award Goal[/color][/b]
To get the Lounge Head Award members need to post 500 posts in the Lounge section. Earlier, it was 1000 posts. It has been lowered now. Enjoy posting! [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997696]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Less Bans More Warnings and Suspensions[/color][/b]
[url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#9999FF]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] made a few amendments to the Warning, Ban and Suspension systems policy of HF. Kindly read the dedicated thread for detailed information. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5998898]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997696][color=#FFFFFF]Lounge Head Award Goal[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
The lounge head award has been altered a little bit, you can now achieve the award for just 500 posts instead of the old 1000 posts that were required when the award was brought back with the new award system. Omniscient also stated that there are more goal awards coming so keep your eyes out for some upcoming awards.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997762][color=#FFFFFF]Official Github Social Login[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999FF][b]Xerotic[/b][/color][/url]
A new addition to the social logins has been added, you can now use your GitHub account to log in.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997509][color=#FFFFFF]Official My Bio Box[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=#9999FF][b]Xerotic[/b][/color][/url]
Xerotic has added a new section to the new profile pages. You now have a bio area which you can put anything and everything like you would in a post or thread.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Member Feedback & Testimonials[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5995561][color=#FFFFFF]Where has time gone?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=54244][color=#ED1C24][b]Condoms[/b][/color][/url]
Condoms Has been here at Hack Forums since 2009 and has a lot to say.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5993887][color=#FFFFFF]Benji's Testimonial[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4066576][color=#2D7E52][b]Benji[/b][/color][/url]
Benji has shared a lovely story of his time here at Hack Forums.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997400][color=#FFFFFF]Feedback Social Media Account[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient is asking the community how they are using the new social media addition to there account.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997918][color=#FFFFFF]USA Jeffrey Epstein found dead in cell.[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1573817][color=#ED1C24][b]Spaark[/b][/color][/url]
Jeffrey Epstein the accused child sex-trafficker has been found dead within his prison cell.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997899][color=#FFFFFF]Do you think you are / were lucky in your life?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4130933][color=#FFFFFF][b]duck[/b][/color][/url]
Have you ever been lucky in your life or are you just always luck or glad to have something, well share it what it is with everyone?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5990405][color=#FFFFFF]Will Area 51 be Raided on Sept 20 2019?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=881874][color=#0066FF][b]BottomNotch[/b][/color][/url]
BottomNotch has made a thread about a website he has found that is taking in bets saying if the site will get raided or not. The odds are not to bad either.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5998005][color=#FFFFFF]Bytes[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=516470][color=#EC7E03][b]SoulZeh[/b][/color][/url]
Since the new lounge head has been made a little easier get bytes have been on the rise again due to more and more posts but SoulZeh has never had so many bytes and doesn't know what to do with them and is looking for some help.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5937851][color=#FFFFFF]Diesel or Petrol[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4129808][color=#FFFFFF][b]FakeAltAcc[/b][/color][/url]
Some people prefer petrol as they have a lot of instant power versus the diesel side where they have a bit more power in the later side. But which is your preferred type?
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]

[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5998035][color=#FFFFFF]10$ + 500 Bytes Giveaway![August 21][/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3986518][color=#FFCC00][b]Infinity[/b][/color][/url]
Infinity is hosting a nice little giveaway with two winners, everyone has a nice even chance of winning so if you are feeling lucky and want to have a chance in winning $10 or 500 bytes then make sure you enter.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5997530][color=#FFFFFF]Puzzle $20 PayPal - Bytes Rumble Battle[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1255039][color=#FFFFFF][b]The Worker[/b][/color][/url]
The Worker has come up with a very nice little puzzle game giveaway where you can donate to him a range of two bytes to 60 bytes at once per post. You can't just post again to after you just donated as you must wait for another to do so. The giveaway will end once he gets to 1,000 bytes the person who gave him the bytes last wins $20 PayPal.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5996177][color=#FFFFFF][2] $25 BTC Giveaway / Free Upgrade for non upgraded members[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4034291][color=#FFCC00][b]C A M[/b][/color][/url]
C A M is giving away $25 or a free upgrade to two lucky members so make sure you and go and check out his thread and get a chance to win.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]
posts.subject: Hack Forums News // Edition 442

posts.message:
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=medium][color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/3.png[/img][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/trends-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]MrBeast Destroys His Friends Cars[/color][/b]
MrBeast decided to send his friends to a shopping spree. He gave them $10,000 to spend on whatever they wanted. While they were away, MrBeast smashed their cars with massive rocks. When they returned, they weren't too happy at first. But after MrBeast told them they get another $10,000 each to buy a new car, they got astonished and delighted. They got their new cars and a bunch of other goodies prior.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0DaMUhgcAqo]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Kid Makes Water Slide Out of Bamboo And Mud Clay[/color][/b]
YouTuber AzzyLand has shared with us a video showing this kid who seems to build an entire slide with a pool entirely out of bamboo and mud clay. That kid is known for making all kinds of mind-blowing things out of things found in nature. From the looks of this video, the kid seems to know what he's doing, and the result of his creation is amazing. It looks like it may have taken days to construct, but the kid was determined to get it done.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ief6uVeddxI]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Rolling Over 1,000 Coke Cans With A Steam Roller[/color][/b]
YouTuber JustDustin buys a bunch of coke and has somehow acquired a steamroller which he will be using to smash all the coke cans with. As filler content for the video, they test out the steam roller on various other items before the coke arrives. Something about watching things get smashed is very satisfying, especially when the items are getting smashed by a steam roller.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ic1itOHGzXk]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=#ccffff]Horoscopes[/color][/b] / [i]Aug 12, 2019 - Aug 18, 2019[/i]
[spoiler]
[list]
[*][b][color=#cc3333]Aries ♈[/color][/b]
[i]"The focus on your sector of creativity and self-expression continues this week with the addition of chatty Mercury. You may be very curious to explore interests or hobbies that channel the passionate and competitive side of your nature.

Plus, with a delightful sun-Venus connection on Tuesday, this is a perfect chance to break the ice and ask that special person on a date. It could be a heartwarming experience. In general, this is not the time to hide away but to get out and enjoy the experience of living and loving.

Friday may need a little bit of care as an impulsive Mercury-Uranus tie could see you purchasing something on the spur of the moment. Later, though, you could regret it and feel you’ve wasted your money. A pause for thought would be helpful.

On Saturday, feisty Mars moves into Virgo and your sector of lifestyle and wellness, inspiring you to get organized and jettison activities that you’ve lost interest in."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff99ff]Taurus ♉[/color][/b]
[i]"Once again, your home and family sector is the main focus, with plenty of action in this area. This could be the week you’re planning to hold a major celebration, reunion, or other get-together, in which case it could all go very well.

Tuesday could be particularly lovely for having family and friends around or perhaps doing something to beautify your place. This can be a lovely time for wandering around vintage shops or interior design offices and picking up some ideas and interesting pieces as well.

There may be a clash of opinions on Friday that could be difficult to resolve if both of you are being particularly stubborn. One of you will need to give way and find a compromise in order to move on.

On Saturday, there’s a change of focus as warrior Mars moves into Virgo and your leisure sector. Whether you enjoy sports or you’re looking to date, you could be quite competitive."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=2]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#66cc33]Gemini ♊[/color][/b]
[i]"Do you have something to say? It’s seems no one will be able to get a word in edgewise. With a powerful focus on your sector of communication, your conversation and desire to interact could ramp up several notches. If you work in sales, media, or tech, you could have a busy and productive week ahead of you. And with the sun merging with luscious Venus, it might be possible to sign a lucrative deal or bond with someone who can be of great benefit to you in the future.

Mercury angles toward restless Uranus on Friday, which could make it difficult to communicate. You may talk at cross purposes and end up completely misunderstanding each other. Not the best outcome if you’re going on a first date.

As fiery Mars moves into Virgo and your home zone over the weekend, this active influence could see you making short of work of tasks that have been on your domestic to-do list for a long time."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=3]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3399ff]Cancer ♋[/color][/b]
[i]"You might be on a mission to get your finances sorted out, but at the same time you might also have shopping on your mind. You may need to find a balance between the two if you’re going to keep money matters on an even keel.

However, the focus on your sector of values could also be a call to consider your level of self-worth. Learning to love yourself could be one factor that helps increase your income.

The way you want to spend your Friday evening may be different than that of your friends. Go your own way and do your own thing, because you really can have more fun.

However, as dynamic Mars moves into Virgo and your sector of communication on Saturday, you may be more proactive about promoting your work, getting organized, and networking with all the right people. It would help to avoid being too critical, though, of both yourself and others."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff9933]Leo ♌[/color][/b]
[i]"With some empowering influences in your sign this week, you may feel as though you can accomplish anything. Your confidence looks high, and you’ll find it easy to express yourself, get help and support for your various plans and projects, and be the leader you naturally are.

This week can be excellent for a makeover, and a lovely transit involving sweet Venus might inspire you to reinvent yourself. This can be very self-affirming if you’ve recently been through a period of change and wish to embrace this more fully.

When it comes to connecting with your boss or someone in authority on Friday, there’s a chance you may not see eye to eye. While this won’t last too long, it’s best not to hold any important conversations at this time because they may not turn out the way you want.

Your psyche may be more stirred up than usual from this weekend and for around six weeks. Watch your dreams because they may provide creative inspiration."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=5]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#339933]Virgo ♍[/color][/b]
[i]"A powerful focus on your spiritual sector could encourage you to focus on spiritual practices, such as meditation, yoga, or anything else that can help bring peace of mind.

Looking for romance? Tuesday may bring possibilities if you’re going to a tai chi class or other group. Connecting with those who share your ideas and ideals could assist you in meeting someone very special.

This is very much a time to think about hiring the services of a life coach who can help you live to your full potential.

However, your beliefs and those of another could clash on Friday. While it might drive you apart, it can also draw you together. You might really appreciate someone who thinks very differently than you.

On Saturday, dynamic Mars moves into your sign for a six-week stay, enhancing your energy and courage. The coming weeks could be very productive for you."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=6]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3366ff]Libra ♎[/color][/b]
[i]"Your social life sparkles with promise, and it looks like this side of life will be particularly busy over this week and the coming weeks. Whether you’re a member of various groups, meeting with friends, or just getting out and about, you certainly won’t be bored.

Looking for romance? This is one of the peak times of the year for enjoying life and setting in motion the process of connecting with others. You have more chances now to meet that special person, and encounters can be lively and stimulating. You’re very likely to stand out from the crowd.

But as feisty Mars moves into Virgo and a subtler sector of your chart, this is the time to do a little emotional housecleaning. Are you looking for closure on key issues? Use this opportunity to break free.

You may also feel moved to learn a spiritual practice, such as meditation or tai chi, so you can learn how to get out of your own way and flow with life."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#8B0000]Scorpio ♏[/color][/b]
[i]"With a lively house party going on in Leo and your sector of goals and ambitions, this is no time to stay behind the scenes. The cosmos is encouraging you to promote your work in a big way and not hold back from letting others know what you can do. You’ll have a magnetic attraction about you that others may not be able to resist. If you’re eager to make a big splash, this is very much the time to do so.

Plus, with the sun and lively Venus linking up on Tuesday, you can harness the benefit of this transit by doing a presentation or appearing in public. Don’t be surprised if good things come from this.

Travel and adventure may beckon from Saturday when warrior Mars moves into Virgo and your sector of far horizons. This could see you reaching out for opportunities that are a bit of a stretch."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#FFFF00]Sagittarius ♐[/color][/b]
[i]"Considering the very positive influences in your travel zone, the coming weeks could see you eager to explore. This is a time to relax on an exotic vacation that can melt away your worries and leave you feeling more at peace.

If you have an urge to learn something new or get a certification, this is the time to go for it. In fact, anything that can stretch your abilities and shift you out of your comfort zone has to be very good for you. The willingness to take a leap of faith could see you enjoying a steep learning curve.

Later in the week, dynamic Mars moves into Virgo and your sector of goals, career, and ambitions. The coming six weeks are an opportunity to be more proactive regarding your plans. If you’ve faced obstacles, you’ll be ready to blast them out of the way. And if you’re willing to plan ahead, much can be accomplished."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=9]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#663333]Capricorn ♑[/color][/b]
[i]"The focus is fairly deep at the moment, so don’t be surprised if you feel emotional at times. The current star map could stir up deep-seated feelings around finances, business, and committed relationships.

This is an opportunity to face up to some of those feelings and issues that may have been a problem for too long. However, it can be easier to do so if you have a counselor, therapist, or trusted friend to talk to. Sharing your feelings can melt away those blocks over time and lead to a healthier and wealthier you.

Romantic partnerships could sizzle at this time because there are some very fiery energies kindling the flame of passion and encouraging you to spend more time together.

From the weekend, thoughts of travel, exploring far horizons, and embracing the bigger picture could tempt you to be more adventurous. If you haven’t booked a vacation in a while, you may relish the chance to kick back and unwind."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=10]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#9966ff]Aquarius ♒[/color][/b]
[i]"A delightful merging of luscious Venus and the sun in your relationship zone on Tuesday indicates the potential for a wonderful get-together, special date, or just hanging out with friends and having a great time.

The ongoing focus on your sector of relationships looks like it’s keeping you busy, and you may find that your calendar is full most of the time. It helps to be selective when choosing which events to attend because some may show more promise than others. Still, these lively influences can see you connecting with all kinds of people who may become part of a vibrant network.

Don’t jump to conclusions on Friday, though, as an edgy angle between chatty Mercury and electric Uranus could see arguments brewing if you don’t take the time to listen.

Finally, potent Mars moves into Virgo and a more intense sector of your chart on Saturday, which could stir up your psyche. Over the coming six weeks, a little self-analysis could yield gold."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=11]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#cccc66]Pisces ♓[/color][/b]
[i]"Are you ready to get organized? A sparkling blend of energies in your lifestyle sector might encourage you to be more creative with your time. How do you spend your days? If they seem to pass in a blur in the same old ways, you could feel moved to make a few changes. What do you love to do? Whatever it is, finding ways to include these activities in your daily schedule can energize you and give you a bit of a buzz.

There is also the potential for romance at work or at the gym, and a first-time encounter could be fairly dramatic. It could even be love at first sight.

When dynamic Mars moves into Virgo over the weekend, its six-week stay in this sector could encourage you to clear the air. Don’t shy away from those conversations that can lead to healthier, happier relationships. You may also be more proactive around socializing and dating."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=12]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/list][/spoiler]

[b][color=#ccffff]This Week's Featured Inspirational/Philosophical Video[/color][/b]
[spoiler][yt]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_h-FswIACKE[/yt][/spoiler]
